title: Save Smarter, Not Harder | How To Stick With Your Financial Plan
itunes:title: Save Smarter, Not Harder | How To Stick With Your Financial Plan
description:
Creating a financial plan and making a habit to fulfill it is easier said than done. In this last episode of our Radical Middle series, it is all about sticking to your financial plan based on the dream life you envisioned! We unravel how psychology, our financial decisions, and willpower are all intertwined components to help us recognize ourselves such as our capabilities in saving smarter. 

🎙️ Get full show notes here!
https://bit.ly/3oiCIHn

📑 Get our FREE Modern Frugal Living eBook here!
https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/ebook

📣 Submit your bill of the week and get a shoutout from us
https://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/bill-of-the-week/

💸 Check out our monthly challenge community
http://www.frugalfriendspodcast.com/club

👉🏼 Subscribe for more on YouTube
https://www.youtube.com/frugalfriends

💃🏼 Hang out with us on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/frugalfriendspodcast/
